JOB DESCRIPTION:
Testing Engineer  /  Software Tester (Fresher) (0 to 2 years experience)

Education

  -   Any Graduate, BCA, BBA, BE / BTech, BSc, BCS, MCA, MCS

CTC

  -   60K to 2.4L (As per expertise)

Skill Sets Required

Should know Basics of Testing, build test cases, try A or B testing, Execute Test Cases, Gathering Test Data, Test Plan, should know system level testing, functional, UIUX, defect tracking, training will be provided for entire system know about, Cloud based Application testing.

Required Tester to know basic of Automatic Testing.

Good levels of communication. Both written and verbal.

Candidate should be keen in learning new technology.
